name: Matcha Gin Sour
preparation: In a shaker, combine gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and matcha powder.
Add egg white if using. Shake vigorously without ice to emulsify the egg.
Add ice and shake again until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Optionally, sprinkle a little matcha powder on top for garnish.

name: Pumptini
preparation: Shake vodka, pumpkin spice liqueur, and cream with ice vigorously.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Margarita
preparation: Rub the rim of the glass with a lime wedge and dip in salt.
Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Espresso Martini
preparation: Combine vodka, espresso, and coffee liqueur in a shaker with ice.
Shake well until the mixture is very cold.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with coffee beans.

name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: Cherry and lemon slice for garnish
preparation: In a shaker, combine whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
Shake until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a cherry and a slice of lemon.

name: Negroni
preparation: Add gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir until well chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Amaretto Sour
preparation: Combine amaretto, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously until the mixture is well chilled.
Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.
Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Mojito
preparation: Muddle the mint leaves and sugar in a glass.
Add lime juice and rum, and fill the glass with ice.
Top off with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge and more mint.

name: Moscow Mule
preparation: Fill a mule mug with ice.
Pour vodka and lime juice over the ice.
Top with ginger beer and stir.
Garnish with a lime wedge and mint.
